splash.effect: Every played card counts as every suit
tips: Combine with other flush jokers like Lusty Joker or Gluttenous Joker

blueprint.effect: Copies the ability of the Joker to its right
tips: Position to the left of your strongest joker
Copies xMult jokers for exponential scaling
Works with most jokers except other copy jokers

brainstorm.effect: Copies the ability of the leftmost Joker
brainstorm.implication: Always copies your first joker's effect!
tips: Put your strongest joker in slot 1
Pairs amazingly with Blueprint for triple effects

triboulet.effect: Played Kings and Queens each give x2 Mult when scored
tips: Combine with Baron for held Kings

baron.effect: Each King held in hand gives x1.5 Mult
baron.implication: Hold 4 Kings = x5 Mult without playing them!
tips: Works while cards are in your hand, not played
Combine with Triboulet for Kings that score AND boost held
Add more Kings to your deck
Works with steel and glass cards
Doubles chip and mult from card enhancements
Combine with Triboulet for x4 per face card
Stack with Mime for x3 triggers

dusk.effect: Retriggers all played cards on final hand of round
dusk.implication: Save your best hand for last!
tips: Plan to use your strongest hand as the last one

fibonacci.effect: Cards with Fibonacci ranks (A,2,3,5,8) give +8 Mult each
tips: Works great with Hack for retriggers
Pairs well with Scholar for Aces

steel_joker.effect: Gives x0.2 Mult for each Steel Card in your deck
tips: Add steel enhancement to valuable cards
Steel cards in hand give xMult when held
Scales as you add more steel cards

glass_joker.effect: Gives x0.75 Mult for each Glass Card in your deck
tips: High risk - glass cards can break
Pairs with Lucky Cat for growing xMult
Best in decks with card duplication

egg.effect: Gains $3 sell value at end of round
egg.implication: Buy early, sell late for profit!
tips: Buy in ante 1-2 for maximum growth
Sell when you need the slot or money
Falls off in value late game
Consider selling late game for a scoring joker

to_the_moon.effect: Earn an extra $1 interest for every $5 you have at end of round (max $10)

bull.effect: Gives +2 Chips for each dollar you have
tips: Keep money high for bigger bonus
Has a small chance to be destroyed

vampire.effect: Gains x0.1 Mult per enhanced card played, removes enhancement
vampire.implication: Grows stronger by eating card enhancements!

obelisk.effect: Gains x0.2 Mult per consecutive hand played of your most played type
obelisk.implication: Keep playing the same hand type to scale!

hologram.effect: Gains x0.25 Mult for each card added to deck
tips: Add cards via packs and spectrals
Each card added is permanent growth

ride_the_bus.effect: Gains +1 Mult for each consecutive hand without face card
tips: Reset when face card is played

blackboard.effect: x3 Mult if all held cards are Spades or Clubs
blackboard.implication: Hold only black cards for x3!
tips: Works with cards in hand, not played
Combine with Splash for any-suit diamonds
Combine with Splash for any-suit hearts
Combine with Splash for any-suit spades
Combine with Splash for any-suit clubs

pareidolia.effect: All cards are considered face cards
pareidolia.implication: Every card triggers face card jokers!
tips: Makes all cards work with Triboulet, Baron, etc.
Turns any deck into face cards

scary_face.effect: Played face cards give +30 Chips each

smiley_face.effect: Played face cards give +4 Mult each
tips: Great with Sock and Buskin retriggers

duo.effect: x2 Mult if hand contains a pair
tips: Easy to trigger with pairs in deck
Works with Two Pair, Full House, etc.

trio.effect: x3 Mult if hand contains a Three of a Kind
trio.implication: Three of a kind = x3 Mult!
tips: Needs 3+ of same rank in deck

family.effect: x4 Mult if hand contains a Four of a Kind
family.implication: Four of a kind = x4 Mult!
tips: Needs 4+ of same rank in deck

order.effect: x3 Mult if first hand is a Straight
tips: Only works on first hand of round

luchador.effect: Sell this card to disable the Boss Blind
tips: Invaluable vs The Needle, The Plant, etc.

chicot.effect: Disables the effect of every Boss Blind
chicot.implication: Boss blinds have no special effect!

madness.effect: When Small/Big Blind is selected, destroy a random Joker and gain x0.5 Mult permanently

supernova.effect: +1 Mult for each time same hand has been played this run

riff_raff.effect: When Blind selected, create 2 random Jokers if joker slots available

space_joker.effect: 1 in 4 chance to upgrade level of played hand

scholar.effect: Played Aces give +20 Chips and +4 Mult each
scholar.implication: Each Ace = big chips AND mult!
tips: Add more Aces to your deck

walkie_talkie.effect: Played 10s and 4s give +10 Chips and +4 Mult each
tips: Niche but strong with right deck

reserved_parking.effect: Each face card held in hand has a 1 in 2 chance to give $1
tips: Works while cards are in hand
